title: karuNaikkOr
sahitya:
karuNaikkOr uruvAgak-karum kaDalin Oram aruma kATSi tarum urugan aDi sEra vArum


anupallavi

  sharaNam aDaivarum sakalarum uyyumAru aravaNaittu anbODu AdarittiDum ayyan


caraNam    cancalam minjiDavE sankaTam pongiDavE tanjam enraDaindiDa tanniDam ODi vandu
kenjiDum aDiyArin kEDellAm OTTiDavE nenjam negizhnduDanE anjal enru aNaivOn
